concept-wr.title: Data Reporting Using Ceilometer
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can instrument data-reporting features in your VNF to provide operational data to the Ceilometer service.

conbody.p: You can use Ceilometer and cfn-init to retrieve and parse data and cfn-push-stats to generate statistics that are application specific. These statistics can then optionally be used to generate Ceilometer Threshold Alarms and trigger Heat scaling operations.
